name: Really ANNOYING Birb Simulator
description:
Fly around the city, stealing food from citizens and pooping all over town!

Really ANNOYING Birb Simulator is a wacky simulation where you play as a mean pigeon who likes to poop on everything and everyone. In this procedurally generated city, you can walk and fly to navigate the city, and squawk at the peaceful citizens to frighten them enough to make them drop their food. Eat the food to replenish your “ammo” and, of course, don’t forget to poop!

Default Controls:

  • Mouse to look around
  • Left click to poop
  • Right click to squawk at people
  • Space to jump, double-tap to fly
  • Alt to free-look
  • C to target-lock citizens

Installation:

Windows:

  1. Download the game
  2. Unzip the folder
  3. Double click the .exe file

Mac:

  1. Download the game
  2. Unzip the folder
  3. Double click the .APP file
